source: Templates let you send the same thing to lots of people, as often as you need, without writing a new message each time.

source: Tailor your messages with relevant information to each recipient based on a single template using variables. Variables add placeholders, such as a recipient’s name and reference number, that can be filled each time you send a message.
target: Adaptez vos messages avec des informations pertinentes pour chacun de vos destinataires grâce à un gabarit unique qui utilise des variables. source: GC Notify makes it easy to send personalised messages from a single template.
target: GC Notification facilite l’envoi de messages personnalisés à partir d’un seul gabarit.

source: If you want to include personalised content in your message, you can add a placeholder. Each time you send a message, you can fill the placeholder with details such as a name or reference number. You can do this manually or upload a list of personal details and let GC Notify do it for you.
target: Si vous voulez inclure du contenu personnalisé dans votre message, vous pouvez ajouter un espace réservé. Vous pouvez ajouter les renseignements manuellement, ou téléverser une liste de renseignements personnels et laisser GC Notification les ajouter pour vous.

source: Send up to 50,000 messages at once or automate sending when an action is triggered. To send in bulk, upload an Excel spreadsheet with a list of contacts and schedule the date and time up to 72 hours in advance. To automate sending, integrate the API with your web application or back office system.
target: Envoyez jusqu’à 50 000 messages d’un coup, ou bien automatisez l’envoi lorsqu’une action est déclenchée. Pour automatiser l’envoi, intégrez GC Notification à votre application Web ou à votre système administratif.

source: GC Notify keeps your account secure with two-factor authentication. This means you’ll need to enter a code that gets sent to your phone or email when you sign in.
